section.title: Almalinux / RockyLinux
section.para: 当我们安装 maven 的时候会自动安装 Java 11，需要使用下面方法切换默认Java版本
section.screen:
[root@cloud ~]# alternatives --config java
There are 2 programs which provide 'java'.
Selection Command ----------------------------------------------- 1 java-1.8.0-openjdk.x86_64 (/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.342.b07-1.el9_0.x86_64/jre/bin/java) *+ 2 java-11-openjdk.x86_64 (/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-11.0.16.0.8-1.el9_0.x86_64/bin/java)
Enter to keep the current selection[+], or type selection number: 1 [root@cloud ~]# alternatives --config javac
There are 2 programs which provide 'javac'.
